EmailTemplate.name: Continuous Certification Reminder
EmailTemplate.Body:
#if ($item.remindersSent > 0)This is a reminder that #{end}"$itemName" in "$item.certification.name" is due for certification. It must be completed by $spTools.formatDate($item.overdueDate,3,1).
Please login to IdentityIQ and view your work item inbox to resolve this at your earliest convenience.
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for the "certification required" state for continuous certifications. Note that the "This is a reminder" text is not displayed on the first notification.

Argument.name: ownerName
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that owns the item.

Argument.name: requester
Argument.Description: The identity object that was the scheduler of the certification.

Argument.name: ordinalNumReminders
Argument.Description: The number of this reminder, starting from 1. Passed as a String.

Argument.name: remindersRemaining
Argument.Description: The number of reminders remaining after this one. Passed as a String.

Argument.name: oldDueDate
Argument.Description: The former due date, passed as a java.util.Date.

Argument.name: newDueDate
Argument.Description: The new due date, passed as a java.util.Date.

Argument.name: nowDate
Argument.Description: The current date, passed as a java.util.Date.

Argument.name: created
Argument.Description: The date the item was created, passed as a java.util.Date.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Certification due for item: $itemName
